Salmonella.txt
Explains gene findings

1. spaN: Surface Presentation of Antigens Protein
spaN takes part in a secretory pathway which is responsible for the surface presentation of determinants necessary for Salmonella's entry into mammal cells.



2. PRK08156
PRK08156 is a type 3 secretion system protein. It is also a surface presentation of antigens protein (SpaS).
